Mailing Address: c/o Kelowna Farmers' and Crafters' Market SocietyPO Box 21029Orchard Park Postal OutletKelowna, BC     V1Y 9N8
Service Details: Provides both outdoor and indoor farmer's markets where vendors sell a variety of locally produced fruits, vegetables, meats, dairy, homemade foods, artisan baking, handcrafted items such as pottery, jewellery, woodworking, soaps and more
Major Intersection: Winter Market:  Harvey Ave and Spall Rd
